name: Star Squadron (fallin-games)
description:
Game Description

Join the Star Squadron and work together with ally drones to take out waves of hostile starships in this 3D space sim. As the pilot of this squadron, the ally drones are at your command to either attack individually or be joined together under your control as part of your ship. Upgrade your starship throughout the battle to  keep up with unending waves of stronger enemies. 

This game was developed in a week as part of 2021.1 Brackey's game jam #5

Controls

**This game is intended to be played with a game controller**

XBOX

  • A: Fire
  • B: Drone Controls
  • Y: Change Camera
  • RT: Throttle+
  • LT: Throttle-
  • Left Joystick: Pitch/Roll
  • LB: Yaw-
  • RB: Yaw+

XBOX

  • X: Fire
  • O: Drone Controls
  • △: Change Camera
  • R2: Throttle+
  • L2: Throttle-
  • Left Joystick: Pitch/Roll
  • L1: Yaw-
  • R1: Yaw+

Mouse and Keyboard

  • Space/Left-click: Fire
  • E: Drone Controls
  • Q: Change Camera
  • W: Throttle+
  • S: Throttle-
  • Mouse: Pitch/Roll
  • A: Yaw-
  • D: Yaw+
Credits
